description: Test fixture: PR that aligns with repository goals

pr.title: Add fast PR hygiene check for file count limits
pr.body: Implements file count validation to ensure PRs stay focused and reviewable. This directly supports the goal of enforcing deterministic PR hygiene.

goals: Enforce deterministic, machine-checkable PR hygiene via a single required check run
Deliver fast tri-state verdicts (success|failure|neutral) with fail-safe neutral on errors
non_goals: Re-implementing mature OSS scanners, linters, or policy managers
Long-running or heavy in-process analysis that degrades PR latency

expected_result.summary: PR directly advances PR hygiene goals with focused file count validation
